pageContext.claim: “You know the magic wands that President Obama said: ‘You'll never get your manufacturing jobs back. You'd need a magic wand.’?”
pageContext.analysis: Obama never said this. At a town hall in 2016, he said more manufacturing jobs had been created during his term than at any time since the 1990s, adding that some manufacturing jobs could be recovered and some have disappeared because of automation and other economic trends.
